Subject: failed to start nginx service a high performance web server and a reverse proxy
Description:
failed to start nginx service a high performance web server and a reverse proxy

I am getting this error after creating a VM on Proxmox with the specified server version. I can access the gui to set the network, enable ssh etc. But cannot access the CLI or reach the server over SSH after enabling it. Please let me know how to proceed as it is difficult to debug without access to the CLI.
What_We_Know__c:
We have informed the customer about the possible cause of the issue, missing one of the Network Adapters, and suggested adding it to the VM. It has solved his issue.

We informed the customer about the need to whitelist the EPP in the SentinelOne antivirus to resolve his second issue.
Next_Steps__c: We are waiting forthe  customer's confirmation
Solution_Comment__c: Initially, the customer had problems with accessing the EPP UI due to misconfiguring the network adapters of the VM, then he encountered issues with SentinelOne - EPP Agent compatibility, and we have provided the EPP locations that have to be whitelisted.
